N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 508.1 - Background and intent

State Regulations
(a) This Part
establishes standards and methods for determining rates of payment made
pursuant to title 11 of article 5 of the Social Services Law for assertive
community treatment (ACT) services provided to active clients by ACT
programs. (b) To receive payments
pursuant to title 11 of article 5 of the Social Services Law, an ACT program
must be approved or certified by the Office of Mental Health, and meet the
requirements of XIX of the Social Security Act. (c) Rates of payment established according to
these regulations are intended to be adequate to meet the costs of an
efficiently and economically operated program. Notes
